name: Black Hole Defense (NeatGames)
description:
- - - Controls: WASD + L-Click Shoots.  Push 'E' to place random towers for 5 coins - - -

You've gotten a distress call!  Can you help a planet survive a Black Hole invasion?

It's OUT OF CONTROL!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Black Hole is disrupting all the satellite defense towers. They are malfunctioning, but are still able to defend!

It's OUT OF CONTROL!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Summon random towers at random locations once you collect 5 energy coins! 

It's OUT OF CONTROL!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Made in 48hrs for the GMTK 2020 Jam!
    • Theme: OUT OF CONTROL
    • Made with Unity.
    • Art made in PhotoShop.
    • Music made with ecrett music.  SFX made with sfxr.
    • Genre: Tower-Defense + Top-Down Shooter
    • I always wanted to try a Tower defense game, it was fun and very challenging to make!  I had much more planned, but I got hung up on patrol and tower code (fun but challenging, and I couldn't figure it out 100% yet) I'm still very happy with my first tower defense game :D
  • I will make a Devlog about making this game soon!
    • My GameDev YouTube: www.YouTube.com/NeatGames
